Transcription for 1003721

O
Lord,
O
Lord, Christian soldiers,
marching as to war,
with the cross of Jesus,
knowing not the evil,
as the royal master
leads against the throne.
For the angel baffles in his battle-stone,
O Lord, Christian soldiers,
marching as to war,
with the cross of Jesus,
knowing not the evil,
as the royal master
leads against the throne.
For the angel baffles in his battle-stone,
O Lord, Christian soldiers,
marching as to war,
with the cross of Jesus,
knowing not the evil,
as the royal master
leads against the throne.
For the angel baffles in his battle-stone,
O Lord, Christian soldiers,
marching as to war,
with the cross of Jesus,
knowing not the evil,
as the royal master
leads against the throne.
For the angel baffles in his battle-stone,
O Lord, Christian soldiers,
marching as to war,
with the cross of Jesus,
knowing not the evil,
O Lord, Christian soldiers,
marching as to war,
with the cross of Jesus,
knowing not the evil,
as the royal master
